author: Shiling Pei , John W. van de Lindt , Andre R. Barbosa , Jeffrey W. Berman , Eric McDonnell , J. Daniel Dolan , Hans-Erik Blomgren , Reid B. Zimmerman , Da Huang , Sarah Wichman
title: Experimental Seismic Response of a Resilient 2-Story Mass-Timber Building with Post-Tensioned Rocking Walls

notes.content:
Mass-Timber Rocking-Wall Structural System - 2 PT Rocking Walls with CLT
Testing Parameters:
- 14 EQ Ground Motions
- Max Roof Drift of 5%

Sample Buildings for Mass Timber:
10 Story Forte (Melbourne, Australia)
14 Story Treet (Norway)
9 Story Stadthause (London)
18 Story Brock Commons (Vancouver, BC)
